name: PhilipFosterFarm
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my guide
des:
Guests at the Philip Foster Farm historic site can ask Alexa for information, and get tours and stories from virtual members of the Foster family. Alexa shares a loop of general information about the farm, and each building has a different "host", with a tour of the building, history of the building, and three related stories, which can change seasonally.

To get help, just say help, or check in the museum for how to use My Guide instructions.
